name: Easy Roasted Broccoli
ingredients: {'quantity': '14', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'broccoli'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).. Cut broccoli florets from the stalk. Peel the stalk and slice into 1/4-inch slices. Mix florets and stem pieces with olive oil in a bowl and transfer to a baking sheet; season with salt and pepper.. Roast in the preheated oven until broccoli is tender and lightly browned, about 18 to 20 minutes.

name: Greek Pulled Pork
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(2 pound)', 'name': 'pork tenderloin, fat trimmed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': "Greek seasoning (such as Cavender's), or more to taste"}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(16 ounce) jar', 'name': 'sliced pepperoncini peppers with juice (such as Mezzetta)'}
steps: Place pork tenderloin in a slow cooker; season generously with Greek seasoning. Pour pepperoncini with juice over pork. Cover slow cooker. Cook on High 4 hours.. Shred pork using 2 forks. Cook 10 to 15 minutes more.

name: Whitney and Ashley's Flawless Roasted Vegetables
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'sheet', 'name': 'Reynolds parchment paper'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'zucchini, sliced 1/2-inch thick'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'yellow squash, sliced 1/2-inch thick'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'onion, cut into 1/2-inch wedges'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'red bell pepper, sliced 1/2-inch thick'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'dried Italian seasoning'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, halved'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Line a shallow baking pan with parchment paper.. Place zucchini, yellow squash, onion, and bell pepper in a large bowl. Add olive oil, 2 teaspoons Italian seasoning, salt, and black pepper; toss to coat.. Spread vegetables in a single layer in the prepared pan; sprinkle with more Italian seasoning, if desired.. Bake in the preheated oven on the top rack until vegetables are crisp-tender, about 15 minutes. Squeeze lemon juice over vegetables before serving.

name: Pork Normandy
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'pork tenderloin'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'onion, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'sweet apple - peeled, cored and thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'chicken stock'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'hard apple cider'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'heavy cream'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Melt butter in an oven-proof skillet over medium heat. Sear tenderloin in melted butter, then transfer to a plate.. Add onions to the skillet; cook and stir for 2 to 3 minutes. Stir in apple and cook until golden brown. Stir in flour and cook for about 30 seconds.. Whisk chicken stock and hard cider together in a bowl; pour into the skillet and bring to a boil while scraping the browned bits of food off the bottom of the pan. Return tenderloin to the skillet; season with salt and pepper.. Cover the skillet, transfer to the preheated oven, and bake until is pork is slightly pink in the center, about 45 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).. Transfer tenderloin to a cutting board, and cut into 1 1/2-inch slices.. Place onions, apples, and all liquid from the skillet into a blender or food processor; pulse until smooth. Return sauce to the pan, and reheat over medium-low. Stir in cream and heat until warm.. Spoon sauce over sliced tenderloin to serve.

name: Picante Chicken
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'skinless, boneless chicken breasts'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'picante sauce'}
steps: Open jar of picante sauce and put into a large saucepan. Add chicken breasts to picante sauce and bring to a steady boil. Boil gently for 20 to 25 minutes or until the chicken is no longer pink inside and the juices run clear.

name: Cabbage Success
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'whole milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'head', 'name': 'cabbage, cored and shredded'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'white pepper'}
steps: Melt butter in a large saucepan over low heat. Add the milk, and cook for about 5 minutes, or until hot. Stir in the brown sugar until dissolved. Stir in cabbage and onion, and season with salt and white pepper. Simmer over medium heat until sauce is creamy, and the onion is tender.

name: Easy Homestyle Green Beans
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'slices', 'name': 'bacon, cut into 1 inch pieces'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped onion'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(15 ounce) can', 'name': 'green beans, with liquid'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cube', 'name': 'chicken bouillon'}
steps: Heat a saucepan over medium heat, and add the bacon pieces. Fry for a few minutes, then add the onions. Cook and stir until the onions are tender, about 5 minutes. Pour in the green beans, and crumble in the bouillon cube. Stir to blend, then simmer for about 15 minutes. If you wish to simmer longer, add more water to keep the beans from scorching.

name: Beef Kelaguen
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'lemon juice, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'soy sauce'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Tabasco to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'beef flank steak, very thinly sliced against the grain'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'green onions, thinly sliced'}
steps: Pour lemon juice, soy sauce, and Tabasco into a large, glass bowl. Stir in beef and green onions. Add additional lemon juice if needed to cover the beef.. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and allow to rest at room temperature for 1 hour, until meat turns a grayish-brown color and appears cooked.

name: Portuguese Pork with Red Peppers
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'large cloves', 'name': 'garlic, peeled'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'coarse salt'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'whole black peppercorns'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'pork tenderloin, cut into 1 inch medallions'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'red bell peppers, julienned'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white wine'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemons'}
steps: With a large mortar and pestle, mash the garlic, coarse salt, 1 tablespoon olive oil, and peppercorns into a fine paste. Transfer to a large bowl.. With a mallet, flatten the pork medallions to 1/4 inch thick. Place in the bowl with the garlic mixture, tossing to coat. Cover, and marinate 2 to 4 hours in the refrigerator.. Heat the remaining oil in a large skillet over high heat. Stir in the pork and remaining garlic mixture. Quickly brown pork about 1 minute on each side. Remove from heat, and set aside.. Place red peppers into the skillet, and saute 2 to 5 minutes, until tender but firm. Pour white wine into the skillet, and scrape up the browned bits. Reduce heat to low, return pork to skillet, and continue cooking 10 to 15 minutes, to an internal temperature of 180 degrees F (80 degrees C).. Slice 1 1/2 lemons into thin rounds. Transfer the pork and pepper mixture to a serving platter. Squeeze juice of remaining 1/2 lemon over the pork and peppers, and garnish with the lemon rounds.

name: Creamy Creamed Cabbage
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium head', 'name': 'cabbage, shredded'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Romano cheese'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Blend milk, flour, butter, salt, and pepper in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Stir constantly until a thick white sauce has formed. Set aside.. Bring water to a boil in a separate medium saucepan. Place cabbage in a steamer set over the saucepan and steam until tender but firm.. Alternate layers of white sauce, steamed cabbage, and grated Romano cheese in a small baking dish.. Bake until sauce and cheese are bubbly, about 30 minutes.

name: Grilled Asparagus
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'fresh asparagus spears, trimmed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}

name: Southern Fried Cabbage
ingredients: {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'slices', 'name': 'bacon, cut into thirds'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'head', 'name': 'cabbage, cored and sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'white onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'white sugar'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat; add bacon and season with salt and pepper. Cook until bacon is crisp, 5 to 7 minutes.. Add cabbage, onion, and sugar; cook and stir continuously until cabbage and onion are tender, about 5 to 10 minutes.. Serve and enjoy!

name: Roasted New Red Potatoes
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'small red new potatoes, halved'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper'}
steps: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) and adjust the oven rack to the lowest position.. Toss potatoes with oil, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Arrange, cut-side down, on a rimmed cookie sheet or jellyroll pan.. Roast potatoes in the preheated oven until tender and golden brown, 20 to 30 minutes. Transfer to a serving dish.. Serve and enjoy!

name: Black Beans and Rice
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'uncooked white rice'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'low sodium, low fat vegetable broth'}, {'quantity': '3 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'canned black beans, drained'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cumin'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'cayenne pepper'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Heat oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Add onion and garlic; cook and stir until onion has softened, about 4 minutes.. Stir in rice to coat; cook and stir for 2 minutes.. Add vegetable broth and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce to a simmer, and cook until liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes.. Stir in beans, cumin, and cayenne; cook until beans are warmed through.. Serve and enjoy!

name: Simply Steamed Asparagus
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'asparagus spears'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Place 3 cups water in the bottom half of a steamer pan set. Add butter and salt and bring to a boil.. Trim dry ends off of asparagus. If spears are thick, peel them lightly with a vegetable peeler.. Place asparagus spears in the top half of the steamer pan set. Steam until asparagus is tender, 5 to 10 minutes depending on thickness.. Serve and enjoy!

name: Easy Baked Tilapia
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '(4 ounce) fillets', 'name': 'tilapia'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic salt, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®), or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(16 ounce) package', 'name': 'frozen cauliflower with broccoli and red pepper'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees F). Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.. Place tilapia fillets in the bottom of the baking dish, then dot with butter and season with garlic salt and seafood seasoning.. Top each fillet with a slice or two of lemon.. Arrange frozen mixed vegetables around fillets and season lightly with salt and pepper. Cover the dish with aluminum foil.. Bake in the preheated oven until vegetables are tender and fish flakes easily with a fork, 25 to 30 minutes.. Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Fish in Foil
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'rainbow trout fillets'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'garlic salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'sheets', 'name': 'heavy-duty aluminum foil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh jalapeno pepper, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, sliced'}
steps: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).. Rinse and pat fillets dry. Rub fillets with olive oil, and season with garlic salt and black pepper.. Place each fillet on a large sheet of aluminum foil. Top with jalapeno slices, and squeeze the juice from the ends of the lemon over fillets.. Arrange remaining lemon slices on top of fillets.. Carefully seal all edges of the foil to form enclosed packets. Place packets on a baking sheet.. Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, 15 to 20 minutes depending on size of fillets.

name: Three Bean Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(15 ounce) can', 'name': 'green beans'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'wax beans'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(15 ounce) can', 'name': 'kidney beans, drained and rinsed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onion, sliced into thin rings'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '⅔', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'distilled white vinegar'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'celery seed'}

name: Pesto Pasta with Chicken
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(16 ounce) package', 'name': 'bow tie pasta'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pesto sauce'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and cut into strips'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook until al dente, 8 to 10 minutes; drain.. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Sauté garlic until tender.. Stir in chicken and season with red pepper flakes. Cook until chicken is golden and cooked through.. Combine pasta, chicken, pesto, and sun-dried tomatoes in a large bowl; toss to coat evenly.

name: Blackened Chicken
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'paprika'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cumin'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried thyme'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'onion powder'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground white pepper'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'skinless, boneless chicken breast halves'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cooking spray'}
steps: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray.. Heat a cast iron skillet over high heat until it is smoking hot, about 3 to 5 minutes.. While the skillet is heating, mix paprika, cayenne, cumin, thyme, onion powder, white pepper, and salt together in a small bowl.. Spray chicken breasts on both sides with cooking spray, then coat evenly with spice mixture.. Place chicken in the hot pan and cook for 1 minute. Turn, and cook 1 minute on other side. Transfer chicken to the prepared baking sheet.. Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 5 to 10 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).. Serve and enjoy!

name: Acorn Squash
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'acorn squash, halved and seeded'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'butter'}

name: Easy Garlic Kale
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'kale'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'minced garlic'}

name: Homemade Crispy Seasoned French Fries
ingredients: {'quantity': '2 ½', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'russet potatoes, peeled'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'vegetable oil for frying'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'onion salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'paprika'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water, or as needed'}

name: Roasted Onions
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'yellow onions'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'balsamic vinegar'}
steps: Gather all ingredients. Adjust the oven rack to the lowest position; preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).. Peel onions and cut in half.. Toss onion halves with oil and season generously with salt and pepper.. Place onions, cut-sides down, on a rimmed baking sheet.. Roast in the preheated oven until onions are tender and the cut surfaces are golden brown, 25 to 30 minutes.. Remove from the oven and adjust seasonings if necessary. Drizzle with balsamic vinegar to serve.

name: Easy Slow Cooker Meatballs
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'ground beef'}, {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'Italian seasoned bread crumbs'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'yellow onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'egg, beaten'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(28 ounce) jar', 'name': 'spaghetti sauce'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(16 ounce) can', 'name': 'crushed tomatoes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14.25 ounce) can', 'name': 'tomato puree'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Place ground beef, bread crumbs, onion, garlic, parsley, and egg in a large bowl. Mix well until evenly combined; shape into 16 meatballs.. Pour spaghetti sauce and crushed tomatoes into the slow cooker; stir in tomato puree. Place the meatballs into the sauce mixture.. Cover and cook on Low for 6 to 8 hours.. Enjoy!

name: Rolo Pretzel Turtles
ingredients: {'quantity': '20', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'mini pretzels'}, {'quantity': '20', 'unit': None, 'name': 'chocolate-covered caramel candies (such as Rolo)'}, {'quantity': '20', 'unit': '', 'name': 'pecan halves'}

name: Japanese Tamago Egg
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs'}, {'quantity': '1/4', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'prepared dashi stock'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'mirin (Japanese sweet wine)'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'soy sauce'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vegetable oil, or more as needed'}

name: Grandma's Harvard Beets
ingredients: {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'cornstarch'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white vinegar'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(15 ounce) cans', 'name': 'sliced beets, drained'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'pepper'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Combine sugar, cornstarch, vinegar, and water in a saucepan. Bring to a boil, and cook for 5 minutes.. Add beets to the liquid, and simmer for 30 minutes over low heat. Stir in butter, salt, and pepper, and remove from the heat. Serve warm or chilled.

name: Sautéed Asparagus
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'fresh asparagus'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, chopped'}
steps: Gather the ingredients.. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add asparagus spears and garlic; cover and cook until asparagus is tender-crisp, about 5 to 10 minutes depending on thickness of asparagus.. If you like your asparagus well done, reduce heat and cook for an additional few minutes.. Serve and enjoy!

name: Roasted Asparagus with Parmesan
ingredients: {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'olive oil cooking spray'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'fresh asparagus, tough ends trimmed'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'shredded Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'sea salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder, or to taste'}

name: Baked Honey Mustard Chicken
ingredients: {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cooking spray'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'skinless, boneless chicken breast halves'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'honey'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'prepared mustard'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'paprika'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried parsley'}
steps: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray.. Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Place in the prepared baking dish.. Combine honey, mustard, basil, paprika, and parsley in a small bowl; mix well. Pour 1/2 of the honey mustard mixture over chicken and brush to cover.. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. Turn chicken pieces over and brush with remaining honey mustard mixture. Continue baking until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear, 10 to 15 minutes more. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).. Let cool 10 minutes before serving. Enjoy!

name: Homemade Black Bean Veggie Burgers
ingredients: {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cooking spray'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(16 ounce) can', 'name': 'black beans, drained and rinsed'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'green bell pepper, cut into 2 inch pieces'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onion, cut into wedges'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, peeled'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chili powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'cumin'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'Thai chili sauce or hot sauce'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'bread crumbs'}

name: Slow Cooker Turkey Breast
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(6 pound)', 'name': 'bone-in turkey breast'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 ounce) envelope', 'name': 'dry onion soup mix'}
steps: Rinse turkey breast and pat dry. Cut off any excess skin, but leave the skin covering the breast.. Rub onion soup mix all over outside of the turkey and under the skin.. Place in a slow cooker. Cover, and cook on High for 1 hour, then set to Low, and cook for 7 hours. An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).. Serve with gravy.

name: Chinese Garlic Green Beans
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'oil, peanut or sesame'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'fresh green beans, trimmed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'oyster sauce'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'soy sauce'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Stir in garlic; cook until edges begin to brown, about 20 seconds.. Add green beans; cook and stir until they begin to soften, about 5 minutes.. Stir in oyster sauce, sugar, and soy sauce.. Cook and stir until beans have attained the desired degree of tenderness, 2 to 4 minutes.

name: Miso and Soy Chilean Sea Bass
ingredients: {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sake'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'mirin (Japanese sweet rice wine)'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'miso paste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'packed brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'soy sauce'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '(4 ounce) fillets', 'name': 'fresh sea bass, about 1 inch thick'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped green onion'}
steps: Whisk together sake, mirin, miso paste, brown sugar, and soy sauce in a bowl.. Place sea bass fillets in a large resealable plastic bag; pour marinade over fillets. Chill in the refrigerator for 3 to 6 hours.. Preheat the oven's broiler and set the oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source. Prop the oven door to remain slightly ajar.. Arrange fillets on a baking sheet; discard marinade.. Broil sea bass in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, 7 to 9 minutes.. Sprinkle with chopped green onions to serve.

name: Easy Baked Ham Steaks
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water, or more as needed'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whole cloves'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'slices', 'name': 'ham steak'}
steps: Gather the ingredients. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).. Mix water, brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, and cloves in a baking dish. Arrange ham steaks in baking dish, coating with sugar mixture. Add more water as needed to cover ham.. Bake in the preheated oven until ham is tender, 35 to 45 minutes.

name: Puerto Rican Tostones (Fried Plantains)
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'green plantain'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'oil for frying'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cold water'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Peel plantain and cut into 1-inch slices. Fill a bowl with 3 cups of cold water.. Heat oil in a large deep skillet over medium-high heat; add plantain slices in an even layer and fry on both sides until golden brown, about 3 1/2 minutes per side. Set skillet aside.. Transfer plantain slices to a chopping board; flatten each one by placing a small plate on top and pressing down.. Dip plantain slices in cold water.. Reheat oil in the skillet over medium heat; cook plantain slices for 1 minute on each side.. Season to taste with salt and serve immediately.

name: Pan Fried Brussels Sprouts
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'crushed garlic'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': '', 'name': 'white onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'trimmed Brussels sprouts'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'garlic powder, or to taste'}
steps: Gather the ingredients.. Heat olive oil in a cast-iron skillet over medium-low heat. Add garlic and stir until golden brown and fragrant, about 2 to 3 minutes. Add onion and cook until soft, stirring often, about 5 minutes.. Add Brussels sprouts and cook until one side of the sprouts turns golden brown, 5 to 7 minutes. Stir to turn sprouts over and cook until evenly golden brown, another 5 to 7 minutes. Season with salt, black pepper, and garlic powder.

name: Roasted Garlic Lemon Broccoli
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'heads', 'name': 'broccoli, separated into florets'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'sea salt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'lemon juice'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).. Toss broccoli florets with extra virgin olive oil, sea salt, pepper, and garlic in a large bowl. Spread the broccoli out in an even layer on a baking sheet.. Bake in the preheated oven until florets are tender enough to pierce the stems with a fork, 15 to 20 minutes. Remove and transfer to a serving platter.. Squeeze lemon juice liberally over broccoli before serving for a refreshing, tangy finish.

name: Smoked Fish Dip
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'flaked smoked whitefish'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fat-free sour cream'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fat-free mayonnaise'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'drops', 'name': 'hot pepper sauce, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'drops', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'drops', 'name': 'liquid smoke flavoring (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'seafood seasoning, such as Old Bay'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cracked black pepper to taste'}
steps: Gather the ingredients.. Place whitefish, sour cream, and mayonnaise in the bowl of a food processor; season with hot pepper sauce, Worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke, seafood seasoning, and cracked black pepper.. Blend until combined with a spread-like consistency.

name: Cabbage Steaks
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'head', 'name': 'cabbage'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'light olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper, or to taste'}
steps: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Cut the bottom off of the cabbage and set it so the flat end is on the cutting board; cut into 1-inch thick slices. Arrange slices in a single layer in a large casserole dish.. Drizzle oil over cabbage slices and sprinkle with garlic. Season cabbage with salt and pepper. Cover the dish with aluminum foil.. Bake in the preheated oven until cabbage core is easily pierced with a fork, about 45 minutes.

name: Wonton Soup
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'boneless pork loin, coarsely chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'peeled shrimp, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'Chinese rice wine'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'light soy sauce'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'finely chopped green onions'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh ginger root'}, {'quantity': '24', 'unit': '(3.5 inch square)', 'name': 'wonton wrappers'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'chicken stock'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'finely chopped green onions'}
steps: Make the wontons: Mix pork, shrimp, rice wine, soy sauce, brown sugar, green onions, and ginger together in a large bowl until well combined. Let stand for 25 to 30 minutes.. Spoon about 1 teaspoon filling onto the center of a wonton wrapper. Moisten all four wrapper edges with water and fold over filling to make a triangle; press the edges firmly to seal. Bring left and right corners together above filling; overlap the tips of these corners, moisten with water, and press together to seal. Repeat until all wrappers have been filled and sealed.. Make the soup: Bring chicken stock to a rolling boil in a pot. Gently drop in wontons and cook for 5 minutes.. Ladle into bowls and garnish with green onions.

name: Red Lentil Curry
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'red lentils'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water, or more as needed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'onion, diced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'curry paste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'curry powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cumin'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chili powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'minced fresh ginger'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14.25 ounce) can', 'name': 'tomato puree'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Wash lentils in cold water until water runs clear.. Put lentils in a pot with enough water to cover; bring to a boil and reduce heat to medium-low. Cover and simmer, adding water as needed to keep lentils covered, until tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Drain.. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir onions in hot oil until caramelized, about 20 minutes.. Mix together curry paste, curry powder, turmeric, cumin, chili powder, salt, sugar, garlic, and ginger in a large bowl; stir into onions.. Increase heat to high and cook, stirring constantly, until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes.. Stir in tomato puree and lentils; cook until warmed through.. Serve and enjoy!

name: Perfect Hard-Boiled Eggs
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'distilled white vinegar'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'eggs'}

name: Slow Cooker Green Beans, Ham and Potatoes
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'fresh green beans, rinsed and trimmed'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ham hocks'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'new potatoes, quartered'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chicken bouillon granules'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'onion powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'seasoning salt'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Gather the ingredients.. Halve green beans if they are large; place in a slow cooker with water to barely cover. Add ham hocks and onion. Cover and cook on High until simmering. Reduce heat to Low; cook until beans are crisp but not done, 2 to 3 hours.. Remove ham hocks from the slow cooker. Add potatoes to the slow cooker; cook on Low for 45 minutes.. Meanwhile, remove ham meat from the bones, then chop or shred meat and return to the slow cooker. Season with bouillon, garlic powder, onion powder, seasoning salt, and pepper.. Use a slotted spoon to transfer green beans, potatoes, and ham into a serving dish with a bit of broth.

name: Tomato and Garlic Pasta
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'tomatoes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'name': 'angel hair pasta'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'crushed garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'tomato paste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh basil'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}
steps: Place tomatoes in a large pot and cover with cold water. Bring just to a boil. Pour off water, and cover again with cold water. Peel the skin off tomatoes and cut into small pieces.. Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook angel hair pasta in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 4 to 5 minutes.. Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a large skillet or pan, making sure there is enough to cover the bottom of the pan, and sauté garlic until opaque but not browned. Stir in tomato paste. Immediately stir in the tomatoes, salt, and pepper. Reduce heat, and simmer until pasta is ready, adding basil at the end.. Drain pasta, do not rinse in cold water. Toss with a bit of olive oil, then mix into the sauce.. Reduce heat as low as possible. Keep warm, uncovered, for about 10 minutes when it is ready to serve. Garnish generously with fresh Parmesan cheese.

name: Cheesy Ramen Noodles
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(3 ounce) package', 'name': 'any flavor ramen noodles'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'slice', 'name': 'American cheese'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Bring water to a boil in a saucepan. Add ramen noodles and cook until tender, about 2 minutes.. Pour out water, then stir in seasoning packet and cheese until well blended.

name: Baked Beans from Scratch
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'navy beans, soaked overnight and drained'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'ketchup'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'maple syrup'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'molasses'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chili powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'onion, chopped'}
steps: Gather the ingredients.. Place beans in a large saucepan with 4 cups of water. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer 1 hour.. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Stir ketchup, maple syrup, brown sugar, molasses, Worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, and chili powder together in a small bowl; set aside.. Once beans have simmered for 1 hour, drain, and reserve cooking liquid. Pour beans into a 1 1/2-quart casserole dish; stir in chopped onion and molasses mixture. Stir in enough reserved cooking liquid so sauce covers beans by 1/4 inch.. Cover and bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes; reduce heat to 200 degrees F (95 degrees C) and cook 6 hours longer, stirring beans after they have cooked for 3 hours. Once beans are tender and sauce has reduced and is sticky, remove from the oven, stir, recover, and allow to stand 15 minutes before serving.

name: Easy Baked Beans
ingredients: {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cooking spray'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(16 ounce) cans', 'name': 'baked beans with pork'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'molasses'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped onions'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'ketchup'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'prepared mustard'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'slices', 'name': 'bacon, chopped'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a casserole dish with cooking spray.. Mix together baked beans with pork, molasses, onions, brown sugar, ketchup, and mustard together in a large bowl.. Transfer mixture to the prepared dish and top with chopped bacon.. Cover and bake in the preheated oven until thickened, about 3 hours.. Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Pan Fried Green Beans
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'fresh green beans, trimmed and snapped'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'onion powder, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}
steps: Gather ingredients.. Combine green beans, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper in a stainless steel pot over medium-high heat. Cook, covered, until beans begin to sweat. Remove the lid and stir occasionally until beans are tender.. When beans and spices begin to char on the bottom of the pan, stir in olive oil and turn off heat. Cover and let stand a few minutes.. Scrape the bottom of the pan to incorporate charred spices. Beans should have a dark, caramel color, but not black.

name: Emily's Marinated Venison Steaks
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'soy sauce'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dried minced onion'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'red pepper flakes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dry mustard'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'Kosher salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'thyme'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried, minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(4 ounce)', 'name': 'venison steaks'}
steps: Whisk together Worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, lime juice, onion, red pepper flakes, dry mustard, salt, thyme, black pepper, garlic, and hot pepper sauce in a bowl; pour into a resealable plastic bag. Add venison steaks, coat with marinade, squeeze to remove excess air, and seal the bag. Marinate in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour.. Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate. Remove venison from marinade and shake off excess. Discard remaining marinade.. Cook steaks on the preheated grill until they are firm, hot in the center, and just turning from pink to grey, about 5 minutes per side. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 150 degrees F (65 degrees C).

name: Parchment Baked Salmon
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce)', 'name': 'salmon fillet'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'olive oil cooking spray'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, thinly sliced'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Move an oven rack to the lowest position.. Place salmon fillet, skin-side down, in the middle of a large piece of parchment paper; season with salt and black pepper. Cut two 3-inch slits into fillet with a sharp knife. Stuff chopped basil leaves into the slits. Spray fillet with cooking spray and arrange lemon slices on top.. Fold the edges of parchment paper over fillet several times to seal it into an airtight packet. Place sealed packet onto a baking sheet.. Bake in the preheated oven on the bottom rack until salmon flakes easily and flesh is pink and opaque with an interior of slightly darker pink color, about 25 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of fillet should read at least 145 degrees F (65 degrees C). To serve, cut open the parchment paper and remove lemon slices before plating.

name: Homemade Horseradish
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'peeled and cubed horseradish root'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white vinegar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}

name: Delicious Baked Apples
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'vanilla sugar'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'ground cinnamon, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'apples - peeled, cored, and sliced'}, {'quantity': '3 ½', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'water'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a large baking dish with butter.. Mix brown sugar, vanilla sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a small bowl.. Layer about 1/3 of the apples in the prepared baking dish; sprinkle with 1/3 of the sugar mixture.. Repeat layers twice more.. Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes. Pour water over apples and continue baking until tender, about 15 minutes more.

name: Muesli
ingredients: {'quantity': '4 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'rolled oats'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'raisins'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'toasted wheat germ'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'wheat bran'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'oat bran'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped walnuts'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'packed brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'raw sunflower seeds'}
steps: Combine oats, raisins, wheat germ, wheat bran, oat bran, walnuts, brown sugar, and sunflower seeds in a large bowl; mix well. Store muesli in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 2 months.

name: Pork Chops for the Slow Cooker
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'boneless pork chops'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'soy sauce'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'ketchup'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, crushed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground ginger'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Place pork chops in a slow cooker.. Combine soy sauce, ketchup, brown sugar, garlic, and ginger, and pour over pork chops.. Cover and cook on Low for 6 hours.

name: Mango Salsa
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'mango - peeled, seeded, and chopped'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'finely chopped red bell pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'green onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'fresh jalapeño chile pepper, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped cilantro'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'lemon juice'}

name: Ginger Veggie Stir-Fry
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'vegetable oil, divided'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh ginger root, divided'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, crushed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'cornstarch'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small head', 'name': 'broccoli, cut into florets'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'julienned carrots'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'snow peas'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'halved green beans'}, {'quantity': '2 ½', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'soy sauce'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped onion'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'salt'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Place 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon ginger, garlic, and cornstarch in a large bowl; mix until cornstarch is dissolved.. Add broccoli, carrots, snow peas, and green beans; toss lightly to coat.. Heat remaining 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium heat. Add vegetable mixture and cook for 2 minutes, stirring constantly to prevent burning.. Stir in water and soy sauce; add onion, salt, and remaining 1 teaspoon ginger. Cook and stir until vegetables are tender but crisp.. Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Chicken and Red Wine Sauce
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'skinless, boneless chicken breast halves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'paprika'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'red wine'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}
steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook garlic in oil until tender.. Place chicken in the skillet, and cook for about 10 minutes on each side, until no longer pink and juices run clear. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).. Drain oil from the skillet. Sprinkle chicken with paprika and brown sugar.. Pour red wine around chicken. Cover and simmer, 15 to 20 minutes; lightly baste the chicken with wine sauce while cooking. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Italian Peas
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '16', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'frozen green peas'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chicken stock'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Stir in onion; cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Stir in garlic and cook for 1 minute.. Add frozen peas and stir in stock. Season with salt and pepper. Cover and cook until the peas are tender, about 5 minutes.

name: Lemon Garlic Tilapia
ingredients: {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'nonstick cooking spray'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'tilapia fillets'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'butter, melted'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried parsley flakes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'pepper to taste'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Spray a baking dish with nonstick cooking spray.. Rinse tilapia fillets under cool water, and pat dry with paper towels.. Place fillets in the prepared baking dish. Pour lemon juice over fillets, then drizzle butter on top. Sprinkle with garlic, parsley, and pepper.. Bake in the preheated oven until fish is white and flakes when pulled apart with a fork, about 30 minutes.

name: Lemon-Orange Orange Roughy
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '(4 ounce) fillets', 'name': 'orange roughy'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'orange, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'lemon pepper'}
steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.. Place fillets into hot oil. Drizzle with orange juice and lemon juice, then sprinkle fillets with lemon pepper. Cook until fish flakes easily with a fork, 2 to 3 minutes per side. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).
